translations: adj.职业的，职业技术的，业务知识的

phrs.translation: 职业训练局；职业培训委员会
职业康复；职业复健；职业更新；职业复原辅导

sentences.sentence: He ought to get good vocational training.
sentences.translation: 他应该接受良好的职业培训。

sentences.sentence: Some vocational colleges have worked with companies to teach students.
sentences.translation: 一些职业学院与公司合作来教学生。

sentences.sentence: Some of the vocational college teachers are skilled technicians from companies.
sentences.translation: 一些职业院校的教师是来自公司的技术人员。
